school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: Her class is easy but it\'s hard to stay captive by her lecture. There doesn\'t seem to be a structure for the course that reflects a definitive theory around neuroscience and human sexuality. Much too much literature out there for this class to lack as much.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: I walked in the class expecting it to be boring, but after glancing at her I knew I wud never miss her class.. A smart, hot, and enticing teacher is a rarity.Professor Pooja is the best !!

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: I gotta say I truly only stayed in her class cuz she is pretty hot for a teacher. MAterial isnt too hard slightly tricky but she is helpful. I think she curves. Goes over the material in an interactive manner and has facebook so look her up.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She\'s cool knws wht she\'s talking about. 2 exams 2 presentations. Exams r easy if u read the slides well.

school_name: Rutgers - State University of New Jersey
comments: She\'s cool knws wht she talking about. Exams are fair if u study. 2 presentations and 2 exams. I took her in summer.
